content: *twist is a classic headband with a twist in the front with the sizes instructed in the pattern you can provide the whole family with warm ears but you can easily make the headband as long and wide as you want the headband is worked in the round making it twice as thick and therefore twice as warm it is therefore the ideal project to practice knitting with circular needles and the magic loop method it slides off the needles surprisingly quickly so it also makes it the perfect gift knitting project * **sizes** 1 2 3 4 to fit a head circumference of 52-54 54-56 56-58 58-60 cm / 20 5-21 25 21 25-22 22-22 75 22 75-23 5 *shown in size 3 in colour 487 and 1338 on a head circumference of 57 cm / 22 5 * *because the length of the headband is determined while knitting the finished length is easily adjusted to your own head circumference * **finished measurements** circumference 47 49 51 53 cm / 18 5 19 25 20 20 75 width 9 10 11 5 12 5 cm / 3 5 4 4 5 5 *would you like a smaller/wider headband decrease/increase the amount of cast on stitches keep in mind the amount of yarn needed when doing so * **yarn** 1 skein rauma 2-tråds gammelserie 50 g / 160 m and 1 skein rauma alpakka lin 50 g / 175 m or approx 75 88 105 118 m / 82 98 114 132 yd in worsted weight yarn to get gauge f e rauma fivel drops air wooladdicts water … **suggested needles** 4 5 mm / us 7 circular needles with total length of 80 / 32 or size to get gauge **gauge** 16 sts x 20 rnds to 10 cm / 4 in stockinette stitch after blocking with 1 strand rauma 2-tråds gammelserie and 1 strand rauma alpakka lin **used stitch patterns and techniques** -stockinette stitch in the round -magic loop method
